docs.snippet: Bank of America apologized Wednesday for a double-billing glitch that affected some customers who made purchases with Apple Pay, the new mobile payments service that Apple launched this week....

headline.main: BofA to Refund Apple Pay Customers Charged Twice
headline.print_headline: BofA to Refund Apple Pay Customers Charged Twice

docs.lead_paragraph: Bank of America apologized Wednesday for a double-billing glitch that affected some customers who made purchases with Apple Pay, the new mobile payments service that Apple launched this week.

docs.snippet: Stocks fell broadly on Wednesday, snapping a four-day winning streak for the Standard & Poor's 500 index, as investors shaken by recent swings in the market sold some of their holdings. A drop in the price of oil dragged down energy stocks. Sm...

headline.main: How the Dow Jones Industrial Average Did Wednesday
headline.print_headline: How the Dow Jones Industrial Average Did Wednesday

docs.lead_paragraph: Stocks fell broadly on Wednesday, snapping a four-day winning streak for the Standard & Poor's 500 index, as investors shaken by recent swings in the market sold some of their holdings. A drop in the price of oil dragged down energy stocks. Small-company stocks also fell as traders unloaded riskier assets.

docs.snippet: Proposed changes to the NBA's draft lottery format designed to distribute the odds more evenly among the non-playoff teams failed to pass at the league's board of governors meeting on Wednesday, Commissioner Adam Silver said....

headline.main: Plans to Reform NBA Draft Lottery Fail to Pass
headline.print_headline: Plans to Reform NBA Draft Lottery Fail to Pass

docs.lead_paragraph: Proposed changes to the NBA's draft lottery format designed to distribute the odds more evenly among the non-playoff teams failed to pass at the league's board of governors meeting on Wednesday, Commissioner Adam Silver said.

docs.snippet: The Navajo Nation Supreme Court has rejected an appeal by a tribal presidential hopeful to remain on the Nov. 4 ballot after he was disqualified for refusing to prove his fluency in the Navajo language, court documents showed on Wednesday....

headline.main: Navajo Court Removes Presidential Candidate Over Language Dispute
headline.print_headline: Navajo Court Removes Presidential Candidate Over Language Dispute

docs.lead_paragraph: The Navajo Nation Supreme Court has rejected an appeal by a tribal presidential hopeful to remain on the Nov. 4 ballot after he was disqualified for refusing to prove his fluency in the Navajo language, court documents showed on Wednesday.

docs.snippet: Facing an even bigger mountain of packages this holiday season, FedEx and UPS are hiring more workers to avoid the delays that frustrated shoppers and gift-recipients a year ago....

headline.main: FedEx, UPS Make Plans for a Better Holiday Season
headline.print_headline: FedEx, UPS Make Plans for a Better Holiday Season

docs.lead_paragraph: Facing an even bigger mountain of packages this holiday season, FedEx and UPS are hiring more workers to avoid the delays that frustrated shoppers and gift-recipients a year ago.

docs.snippet: An unstoppable last-gasp shot from defender Yordan Minev gave Ludogorets a 1-0 victory over 10-man Basel on Wednesday as they became the first Bulgarian team to register a Champions League group stage victory....

headline.main: Ludogorets Make History With 1-0 Win Over Basel
headline.print_headline: Ludogorets Make History With 1-0 Win Over Basel

docs.lead_paragraph: An unstoppable last-gasp shot from defender Yordan Minev gave Ludogorets a 1-0 victory over 10-man Basel on Wednesday as they became the first Bulgarian team to register a Champions League group stage victory.

docs.snippet: By now, there should be no question in anyone's mind that Shailene Woodley is an actress on a rapid-fire journey to stardom. She's enchanted us in enough films — "The Descendants," ''The Spectacular Now," ''The Fault in Our Stars" — th...

headline.main: Review: Shailene Woodley Gets Lost in a Blizzard
headline.print_headline: Review: Shailene Woodley Gets Lost in a Blizzard

docs.lead_paragraph: By now, there should be no question in anyone's mind that Shailene Woodley is an actress on a rapid-fire journey to stardom. She's enchanted us in enough films — "The Descendants," ''The Spectacular Now," ''The Fault in Our Stars" — that one less-than-stellar film won't alter her upward trajectory.

docs.snippet: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang scored twice in the first 18 minutes as Borussia Dortmund trounced Galatasaray 4-0 to maintain their status as Group D leaders in the Champions League on Wednesday....

headline.main: Dortmund Crush Galatasaray to Maintain 100 Percent Record
headline.print_headline: Dortmund Crush Galatasaray to Maintain 100 Percent Record

docs.lead_paragraph: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang scored twice in the first 18 minutes as Borussia Dortmund trounced Galatasaray 4-0 to maintain their status as Group D leaders in the Champions League on Wednesday.
